scripts.docker:build: docker build -t aua-portal -f ./devops/Dockerfile --build-arg NODE_ENV=prod --build-arg REACT_APP_AUA_GIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) .
scripts.docker:push: aws ecr get-login-password --region ap-southeast-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 680876118134.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com; docker tag aua-portal:latest 680876118134.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/aua-portal:latest; docker push 680876118134.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/aua-portal:latest
